headline: HPE Labeled a ‘Show-Me Story’ for 2026 as Strategy Evolves
summary: Hewlett-Packard Enterprise Company (NYSE:HPE) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On January 13, Goldman Sachs analyst Katherine Murphy assumed coverage on the stock to Buy from Neutral with a price target of $31. The rating coverage follows HPE’s acquisition of Juniper in July 2025, which the firm believes has […]
